subject: Economy
question_en: What is the term used for the total value of goods and services produced in a country within a specific time period?
question_hi: एक देश में एक अनुमानिशीय निर्माण की जानकारी कैसे प्राप्त कीजिए।
explanation_en: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) refers to the total value of goods and services produced within a country's borders during a specific time period. It includes both public and private sector activities.
explanation_hi: मध्येतातील भागीय योजना (GDP) refers to the total value of goods and services produced within a country's borders during a specific time period. It includes both public and private sector activities.
explanation_en: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) refers to the total value of goods and services produced within a country's borders during a specific time period. It includes both public and private sector activities.
explanation_hi: मध्येतातील भागीय योजना (GDP) refers to the total value of goods and services produced within a country's borders during a specific time period. It includes both public and private sector activities.
question_en: What is the term used to measure the total value of goods and services produced within a country?
